item.title: Lets spin the server inside vpc
item.description: - name: test boolean hosts: all vars: SPIN_IN_VPC: false connection: local tasks: - shell: xcowsay 'spinnning in vpc' when: SPIN_IN_VPC|bool - shell: xcowsay 'spinnning in classic world :(' when: not SPIN_IN_VPC|bool
